text: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño ti
edit: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi – aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño ti!

translations.transtext: Then the Blessed One uttered this exclamation, "Oh!, friends, Koṇḍañña understood [it]. Oh!, friends, Koṇḍañña understood [it]."
